sentences.en: About 50 % of wetland structure and function is determined by water.
sentences.cn: 大约一半的湿地结构和功能是由水决定的.

sentences.en: Distributed in mountain streams, wetland and pools in Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 分布于香港的山溪 、 湿地、丛林.

sentences.en: Generally speaking wetland is classified into natural wetland and artificial wetland.
sentences.cn: 一般来讲,湿地分为自然湿地和人工湿地.

sentences.en: Hong Kong Wetland Park reserves all rights regarding this service.
sentences.cn: 香港湿地公园保留所有有关此服务的最终决定权.

sentences.en: However , the ecologic problems bring bad effects on the local wetland ecotourism.
sentences.cn: 通过湿地旅游开发可以促进洪湖经济发展和推动湿地保护.

sentences.en: The average ratio of reflectivity of Carex lasiocarpa wetland is 21.
sentences.cn: 毛果苔草湿地反射率平均为21.

sentences.en: The peat is a carrier of the wetland nitrogen in the marsh.
sentences.cn: 泥炭是沼泽湿地氮的载体,是氮素的源、汇或转化器.

sentences.en: The scientists are prospecting this wetland area for mineral resources.
sentences.cn: 科学家正在勘探这片湿地寻找资源.

sentences.en: The wetland resources are abundant in the mid - subtropical zone of China.
sentences.cn: 中国中亚热带地区湿地资源丰富.

sentences.en: There are some areas of wetland which are of ancient origin.
sentences.cn: 有一些湿地在古代就形成了。

sentences.en: Therefore , sustainable development should become the direction to Honghu wetland ecotourism.
sentences.cn: 洪湖湿地生态也面临一些生态问题,影响了湿地生态旅游的开展.

sentences.en: Today, I want to serve as a wetland caretaker.
sentences.cn: 今天我要当一回湿地管理员.

sentences.en: We are now standing at the Zhalong Wetland of Qiqihar.
sentences.cn: 韩佳:我们现在呢是在齐齐哈尔的扎龙湿地.

sentences.en: Wetland is an important ecosystem on the earth, which is terrestrial ecosystemecosystem.
sentences.cn: 湿地是地球上一种重要的生态系统, 具有巨大的环境功能和环境效益.

sentences.en: Xixi - wetland supposed to be protected as a natural zone.
sentences.cn: 提出西溪湿地自然保护区的保护模式.

trans.tran_cn: 潮湿的土壤，沼泽地，湿地，沼泽地，〈美〉野兽保护沼地
trans.tran_en: an area of land that is partly covered with water, or is wet most of the time
